channel.title: Histograms on Maddie's Blog

item.title: Histograms
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) It’s time to build a histogram on Rstudio! After we download the Lahman, sqldf, and ggplt2 packages, we are going to select a certain column from the Master list to display. Let’s do body weight for all the players. query<-"select weight from Master" result<-sqldf(query) Now we just translate this data into a histogram using this code. “Fill” means the color of the bars and “bins” means the number of bars.
